In addition to endorsing Clinton, Miranda held a benefit showing of the musical in July, where admission to the show supported the Clinton campaign    some tickets reportedly went for as much as $10, 000.

”Hamilton” is a    musical that tells the story of Alexander Hamilton, a penniless immigrant who rose to become the   man of General George Washington, as well as a key figure in the creation of the U S financial system and the creator of the U S Coast Guard.
The Obamas have been vocal and unabashed fans of the musical, as well as Miranda’s body of work.

After the show on Friday evening, Brandon Victor Dixon, who plays America’s third vice president, Aaron Burr, read a statement directed at Pence, who was in the audience, while standing in front of the cast in full costume.

Washington (CNN)  Donald Trump accused the ”Hamilton” cast Saturday of harassing Vice   Mike Pence at a performance Friday evening after the actors called on Pence to ”uphold our American values”.
Donald Trump got into a Twitter duel with the cast of the   show “Hamilton” on Saturday for lecturing Vice   Mike Pence and questioning whether he’ll uphold “American values.
